title: Please help, Launcher not working
body:
Hi!
So you see, just now my wifi dropped when my client was running. when I fixed my wifi, I exited out of lol since it couldn't connect. Then the launcher wont work. I will click on the app and the logo will appear for 2 seconds and disappear. I tried to change the uac and deleted a file. Please help. This is on the new launcher. I just played lol 30 mins ago

replies.body:
Since disabling UAC didn't seem to help, first make sure to check out the other steps in the [**permission guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) to make sure that's not the cause of the problem. 

If that doesn't get you very far, let's try looking back over your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for anything that might be be affecting League connection to our servers.
